text: On - sushchestvovavshiy prezhde, chem sotvorena lyubaya veshch', vechnyy, ostayushchiysya posle gibeli i ischeznoveniya vsyakoy veshchi, vidimyy v kazhdoy veshchi - ved' v kazhdoy veshchi - znameniya Allakha, skrytyy, kotorogo ne postigayut vzory, a On polnost'yu znayet vsyakuyu veshch' - yavnuyu i skrytuyu
